评论概述: Lovely material but not a fan of the elastic sleeves
评论详情: I love the rich color of this blouse and the shiny, silky material. The collar is beautiful with draping action on the front - this is great on its own or under a blazer. My one complaint about the shirt is the elastic sleeves. These make the shirt seem a bit less professional than a traditional cuff or a simple open sleeve. I've gotten around this by pushing up the elastic on my arms and allowing the sleeves to drape back down a bit so the elastic doesn't show.
The neck was too big, the sleeves were too long, and the fabric looked cheap.
When I raised my arms, it felt like it was made for someone substantially shorter than me. I’m only 5’4”.  I returned it.

评论概述: Expensive looking satin blouse. Good value.
评论详情: A woman’s wardrobe should have certain staple pieces. A well-fitting, ivory, satin or silk blouse is one of them. This is a wonderfully versatile example. Fits well, has a flattering cut along the sides, and an interest point at the neck. Personally, I like things to stay put and not have to fuss with them, so I put a couple of tiny stitches, on the inside of the top detail, to hold everything in place. But that’s me! Not really needed….  Could look good with skinny jeans, pumps, hoop earrings and a clutch. Or, it could be the separates version of a LBD! Ivory blouse, black pencil skirt, black pumps, gold or silver clutch and maybe a pair of CZ studs! Or, pearl studs! So many ways to dress this blouse up or down. Comes in wonderful colors. Good value…looks very upscale department store, at an affordable price! 🌺

Really liked this blouse. Nice and soft and very comfortable. As comfortable as the top was it was still very elegant looking.  The wrinkles came out pretty easily but it is a bit of a pain to iron. The color “pink” is more like a dusty pink.  I ordered a M but I think it might be too big so I’m returning for a small. I’m not able to exchange because the small is  currently not “prime”. Crossing my finger the small will be a better fit and still comfortable. Well made blouse, recommend.
This blouse is so pretty! The design is very sophisticated and it fits really nicely (true to size!). The material is high quality. Great value for money. Would recommend.
